QuestData.Title: Raal
QuestData.Description: Crazzak is a traitor in priest's clothing who thinks if he tortures enough of us it will hurt our loa.$b$bDey even have my husband Raal up on de apex of Zanchul. Normally I would say dey could have him, but dey are using his connection to Pa'ku to weaken de loa.$b$bCan't have dat. Let's get to de top of Zanchul and rescue my worthless husband.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The one attempting to corrupt Hexlord Raal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Crazzak and free Hexlord Raal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Hexlord Raal at the top of Zanchul.
